thread.title: Mara

author: Mara
title: Mara
text: My first order arrived very quickly and when i opened the box....wow meraviglioso!all my clothes wrapped in a violet paper...and there was in a lovely sachet a mirror with Candys...and all the indications for returns are very dettaillated and kind.size chart helped me choosing the right dresses.at least..the clothes are bellissimi!very good quality of customer service and clothes!grazie mille top vintage staff!^_^
